There's been a death in his family.	他的家不幸有人身亡。
I want you to consider all the pros and cons.	我希望你们权衡一下一切利弊。
The upstairs rooms are much warmer than those on the ground floor.	楼上的房间要比底层的暖和得多。
The writer refused to make further negotiations with their publisher.	那位作家拒绝和他们的出版社进一步商讨。
I have class tomorrow.	我明天有课。
The author kills off her hero in Chapter7.	作者把她的主人翁安排在第七章中死去。
Some game-birds are kept until they are high before cooking.	有些猎获的飞禽一直保存到开始变质才烹制.
He flipped over the piece of paper to see what was written on the back.	他猛然把那纸翻过来，看背面写着什么。
Mary dyed her hair blue.	玛丽把她的头发染成蓝色。
My cousin, who is a lawyer, is in France at present.	我的律师表哥现在在法国。
I was lonely without her.	她不在，我很孤独。
After a long debate, the house of commons approved the bill.	经过长时间的辩论，下议院通过了议案。
I'd do anything for Tom.	我会为汤姆做任何事。
If we only allow five minutes for catching our train, we'll be cutting it too fine.	假如我们只留五分钟的时间赶火车, 那麽我们卡的时间就太紧了.
This magazine has a large circulation.	这本杂志发行量很大。
I'll let you have the new geography and you may pay me the remainder of the money.	我卖给你一本新的地理书，其余的钱你可以能够还的时候还我。
He died of lung cancer.	他死于肺癌。
A pavilion is halfway up the hill.	山的半中腰有一座亭子。
I have to turn the matter over and over before make a decision.	我在做出决定之前不得不再三考虑此事。
We are very privileged to have Senator Dobbs with us this evening.	今晚有多布斯参议员光临, 我们感到十分荣幸.
Would you like to go?	你想去吗？
I usually have breakfast at seven.	我通常七点吃早餐。
She spends her leisure time making dolls.	她利用空闲时间做布娃娃。
Pines are evergreens.	松树是常青树。
I had a vision.	我有一个设想。
What do you want to be when you grow up?	你长大后想成为什么？
I was roped in for this excursion before I knew it.	我不知不觉被拉来参加了这次远足旅行。
I am in the school football team.	我是学校足球队的队员。
He always takes a wine gourd.	他常带着一个酒葫芦。
The country's car industry is so strongly protected that foreign cars are rarely seen there.	该国对汽车工业严加保护, 外国汽车甚为罕见.
His political career has ended.	他的政治生涯完蛋了。
An official mission was sent to settle the dispute.	一个官方使团被派去解决争端。
The best conductor is silver. Copper comes next.	最好的导体是银，铜居第二。
I know what to say.	我知道要说什么。
It is not the way to educate a child by making him do things against his will.	勉强他做事不是教育孩子的办法。
I would like to speak English fluently.	我想把英语说得很流利。
Be careful not to drive the wrong way on a one-way street.	小心不要在单行道逆向行驶。
Marked by deliberate obscurity of style or expression.	晦涩的以有意使风格或表达上含糊不清为特点的
He gave me a clap on the back and invited me for a drink.	他在我背上拍了一下，请我去喝酒。
You're not very consistent	你前後矛盾, 开头责备我, 接著又夸奖我.
He always wears dark glasses.	他总是带着黑色眼镜。
We enjoyed swimming in the lake.	我们尽情在湖里游泳。
Infringe a contract; infringe a patent.	违反一项合同；侵犯专利权
The retiring miner delivered his pneumatic drill over to his successor.	这位即将退休的矿工把风钻移交给他的接班人。
Fresh fruit is good for your health.	新鲜的水果对你的健康有益。
I'll see to it.	我会留意的。
One of a group of ancient Roman religious officials who foretold events by observing and interpreting signs and omens.	（古罗马）占卜官古罗马宗教官员的一员，可通过观察并解释某些信号及预兆来预言事情
The five-star red flag is fluttering in the wind.	五星红旗迎风飘扬。
This is a picture of my family.	这是一张我全家的照片。
I wish you'd go.	我希望你去。
A boat suddenly appeared out of the mist.	一艘船突然从雾中出现。
I cracked my head on the low door-frame.	我的头撞在低矮的门框上了.
They congratulated us on our victory.	他们祝贺我们的胜利。
Not easily understood; abstruse.	难懂的不容易理解的；深奥的
I wish you could have been there.	要是你能在那里就好了。
Sales of home computers have taken off in recent years.	家庭电脑的销售量近年来上升很快.
I broke the chocolate into halves here's your half.	我把巧克力掰成两半--这一半给你.
Money is a kind of allurement for us.	对我们来说金钱是种诱惑物。
After walking for an hour, we stopped to take a rest.	走了一个小时后，我们停下来休息。
It was fun playing in the park.	在公园里玩很有趣。
This city is noted for its various bridges.	这个城市因为各种桥梁而著称。
She is wise in money matters.	她善于理财。
Money doesn't always bring happiness.	财富并不一定带来快乐。

Is it love?	那是爱吗？

Have you received our remittance?	你方是否已收到我方汇款？

The worker is dyeing cloth in a vat.	工人正在一个大桶里染布。
Tom told me that he'd like to become a doctor.	汤姆告诉我他想当医生。
She's due for promotion soon.	她不久就要晋升了.
This is about as large as that.	这个大约跟那个一样大。
The escaped convict has been caught by the police again.	越狱的逃犯已经再次被警方抓获。
The tomatoes have cropped well this year.	今年马铃薯丰收。
He is unbearable when he's in a bad temper.	他发脾气时让人无法忍受。
The association is under the auspices of Word Bank.	这个组织是在世界银行的赞助下办的。
Why don't you sit down and relax?	你为什么不坐下来放松一下。
This battle field is consecrated to the memory of the soldiers who died here.	这个战场被视为圣地以纪念战死在这里的战士。
I saw a couple of cats in the yard.	在院子里我看见两只猫。
He has an eye for antiques.	他对古董很有鉴赏力。
He has no pretensions to being an expert on the subject.	他并不以这方面专家自居。
She felt warm only when she sat before the fireplace.	她只有坐在壁炉前才感觉到暖和。
The rain prevented me from going.	雨大得让我不能走。
The detection and recording of the sequencing of instructions in computer programs, for example, as used in monitors and debugging routines.	对计算机程序中的指令序列的检测和记录，例如在监控程序和调试程序中使用的情况。
He is allergic to house dust.	他对室内灰尘过敏。
The old man is very kind.	这位老人家非常仁慈。
He broached the subject of a loan with his bank manager.	他向银行经理提出贷款问题。
The first thing you have to take into consideration is time.	你应该考虑的第一件事是时间。
If you are preparing to cut down your price by2%, we may come to term.	贵方如愿意降价2％，我们就可能达成交易。

The capital of the Anglo-Saxon kingdom of Wessex, it was an important center of learning that attracted many religious scholars after the Norman Conquest(1066). Population, 32,100.	温彻斯特区英格兰中南部一自治区，位于伦敦西南。是盎格鲁－撒克逊时期西撒克斯王国的首府。在诺曼征服（1066年）以后，成为一个吸引了众多宗教学者的重要学术中心。人口32，100

In a source document, a collection of lines of text to be printed in the same column. When the vertical space remaining in the current column is insufficient for the block of text, the text is printed in the next column. In the case of single-column format, the next column is on the next page.	在源文件中，打印在相同栏内的若干正文行的集合。在当前栏内所剩余的纵向空间放不下既定一段正文时，则这段正文从下一栏开始打印［或印刷］。在单栏格式的情况下，下一栏便是下一页。
